publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3887 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committeeâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 2 Committee be designated as lead committee in consideration of the Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Prescription of Offices, Ranks and Positions) (Scotland) Amendment (No.2) Order 2003 (SSI 2003/50).
